relating to or having the qualities of pornography: The part of the film judged to be pornographic was cut from the final version. pornographic websites See
pornography
More examplesFewer examplesInvestigators found 463 pornographic images on his computer. The group fought to keep pornographic magazines and videos out of stores and hotels. The tobacco ban comes four months after state prison officials prohibited inmates from possessing pornographic material.In interviews, she has been happy to discuss her love life in almost pornographic detail. The government has also shuttered access to several video-sharing sites because they could carry content that is pornographic, violent or poses a threat to national security.
